content:
Christopher Valle is a Senior Software Engineer at 3M Health Information Systems. His research interests include computational statistics, causal inference, and artifical intelligence.
At 3M, Christopher is engaged in research and development of inpatient and outpatient outcomes for the 3M Performance Matrix Platform, a tool for healthcare payers and providers to monitor cost, utilization, and quality outcomes and analyze performance in managing patients across visits, episodes of care, and disease classifications.
